fr.upmc.components.examples.dynamic_cs.components

Class DynamicAssembler

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upmc.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.upmc.components.examples.dynamic_cs.components.DynamicAssembler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentI

    public class DynamicAssembler
extends AbstractComponent
    The class DynamicAssembler implements a compoennt that creates the other components of the dynamic connection example, makes them interconnect, and starts them.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant      true

    Created on : 14 mars 2014

    Version:
    $Name$ -- $Revision$ -- $Date$
    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
